A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a really awesome\, really action-packed and really entertaining Star Wars movie. It had really amazing special effects\, really awesome music\, really exceptional cast\, really terrific cinematography\, really wonderful characters\, really exciting adventure\, really breathtaking action\, really fabulous humor\, really wonderful costumes\, really well done makeup and a really interesting storyline. It’s one of the best Star Wars movies I’ve ever seen in my whole life. I highly recommend this movie to old and new “Star Wars” fans of all ages.
